post.body: I am looking for talented inventors and scientists for the realization of a grandiose project!

comment.body: @styromaniac@zeroid.bit: No, I need talents ready to move to another country in order to realize their most insane ideas in life.
@Robione: Are there many ideas or forces to implement them?
@Robione: Which project would you like to implement?
@Robione: Write me in detail about your projects that you would like to implement but mail oldgod@zeroid.bit
